PyQuake3D Documentation
=======================

Welcome to the documentation for **PyQuake3D**, A Python tool for 
3-D earthquake sequence simulations of seismic and aseismic slip

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents

   introduction
   installation
   tutorials
   changelog
